Great question:  Hosted assets (ERC-20, BEP2) can be delisted by everyone simply withdrawing their assets and leaving the pool.   Base Assets (BNB, ETH, BTC) can't be delisted since they subsidise gas. The system prevents the last staker leaving (Hotel California)
